description.english: Yet another brand new soul
description.japanese: また一つ、生まれ落ちた魂

description.english: Nothing can stand in your way
description.japanese: 何でもお手のものだね

description.english: Stopped at 10 wins
description.japanese: 10勝で、立ち止まる

description.english: First step into the Advanced Challenge
description.japanese: 初めて進階挑戦へ踏み入れる

description.english: Reach 15 wins with any character
description.schinese: 使用任意角色达到 15 胜
description.tchinese: 使用任意角色達到 15 勝
description.japanese: 任意のキャラクターで15勝に到達する

description.english: You, you, you... And YOU!!
description.japanese: お前も、お前も、そしてお前も

description.english: A new face in the Arena
description.japanese: 演武場に足を踏み入れたばかりの者

description.english: Craft a new item
description.japanese: 新たなアイテムを一つ作り上げる

description.english: Learn the art of Skill Fusion
description.japanese: 技融合を習得する

description.english: Chain five Combos together for the first time
description.japanese: 初めて技を5連携させる

description.english: That guy... talks too much
description.japanese: あいつは……少し騒がしすぎる

description.english: That's more like it
description.japanese: やはり、お前だ

description.english: A firm footing
description.japanese: 感じ悪くない

description.english: Your Soulfire burns anew
description.japanese: 魂火が、再び燃え上がる

description.english: Slay the Shadow Warrior
description.japanese: 影を打ち破る

description.english: Great power, terrible cost
description.japanese: 大きな力には、代償が伴う

description.english: Watch the credits to the end
description.japanese: 開発者リストを目にする

description.english: Inflict 200 stacks of Bleed on an enemy
description.schinese: 对敌方叠加 200 层流血
description.tchinese: 對敵方疊加 200 層流血
description.japanese: 敵に出血を200スタック付与する

description.english: Grant 350 stacks of Armor Enhancement to your side
description.schinese: 对我方叠加 350 层护甲强化
description.tchinese: 對我方疊加 350 層護甲強化
description.japanese: 己に防御力強化を350スタック付与する

description.english: Inflict 50 stacks each of 4 different Debuffs on an enemy
description.schinese: 对敌方施加的 4 种减益效果各 50 层
description.tchinese: 對敵方施加的 4 種減益效果各 50 層
description.japanese: 敵に4種の弱体状態をそれぞれ50スタック付与する

description.english: Grant 50 stacks each of 4 different Buffs to your side
description.schinese: 对我方的 4 种增益效果为各 50 层
description.tchinese: 對我方的 4 種增益效果為各 50 層
description.japanese: 己に4種の強化状態をそれぞれ50スタック付与する

description.english: Win a battle while afflicted with 200 stacks of Debuffs
description.schinese: 我方存在 200 层减益效果的情况下获胜
description.tchinese: 我方存在 200 層減益效果的情況下獲勝
description.japanese: 己に200スタックのデバフがある状態で勝利する

description.english: Inflict a total of 200 stacks of Debuffs on an enemy
description.schinese: 对敌方共计方施加 200 层减益效果
description.tchinese: 對敵方共計施加 200 層減益效果
description.japanese: 敵に合計200スタックのデバフを付与する

description.english: Inflict 200 stacks of Increased Toughness Damage on an enemy
description.schinese: 对敌方叠加 200 层韧性增伤
description.tchinese: 對敵方疊加 200 層韌性增傷
description.japanese: 敵に靭性ダメージ増加を200スタック付与する

description.english: Gain 200 stacks of Skill Damage Up
description.schinese: 对我方叠加 200 层招式增伤
description.tchinese: 對我方疊加 200 層招式增傷
description.japanese: 己にスキルダメージ増加を200スタック付与する

description.english: You can never have enough
description.japanese: だが、何かが足りない

description.english: One more round! Stay perfectly buzzed
description.schinese: 再来一杯！尽全力保持微醺状态
description.tchinese: 再來一杯！盡全力保持微醺狀態
description.japanese: もう一杯！ほろ酔い状態を保て

description.english: Detonate Ignite on an enemy
description.japanese: 敵に付与された点燃を爆発させる

description.english: Detonate Chill on an enemy
description.japanese: 敵に付与された凍傷を爆発させる

description.english: Detonate Shock on an enemy
description.japanese: 敵に付与された感電を爆発させる

description.english: Proficient in three elements
description.japanese: 三種類の元素を操る

description.english: Upon this Long Stair
description.japanese: すべての悪鬼を斬り払え！

description.english: Judgment from the Empire
description.japanese: 帝国からの裁きだ！

description.english: Flying Crescent Slash, ha!
description.japanese: 飛連斬！

description.english: Ablyss Warrior
description.japanese: 深淵の剣士

description.english: Bloodstone Collector
description.japanese: 血石コレクター

description.english: Three Blossoms in the Thorns…
description.japanese: 十花花花…

description.english: Cold outside, warm inside! Perfect for ice fishing
description.japanese: 外は冷たく、中は熱い。氷上でも使える

description.english: Lift more iron. Good for the muscles
description.schinese: 多多举铁，对肌肉有好处
description.tchinese: 多多舉鐵，對肌肉有好處
description.japanese: 運動をたくさんする、筋肉に効く

description.english: Used to its full potential
description.japanese: 使用率は100％だ

description.english: Gather five to summon the dragon
description.japanese: 5つ集めて、神龍を呼び出せ！

description.english: An enthusiast of plain iron crowns
description.schinese: 平平无奇的铁盔？爱好者
description.tchinese: 平平無奇的鐵盔？愛好者
description.japanese: ただの鉄兜？――好きなんだ

description.english: Link 3 skills with a Faerie's Tear
description.schinese: 精灵泪滴连接 3 个招式
description.tchinese: 精靈淚滴連接 3 個招式
description.japanese: 精霊の涙が3つの技をつなぐ

description.english: Synthesize Burning Ember
description.japanese: 燃火残灰を融合する

displayName.japanese: 征服せず、喰らい尽くす

description.english: Synthesize Beastly Emblem
description.japanese: 獣の徽章を融合する

description.english: Synthesize Hunter's Impulse
description.japanese: 狩猟衝動を融合する

description.english: Synthesize Raptor Idol
description.japanese: 猛禽彫刻を融合する

description.english: Synthesize Twilight's Judgment
description.japanese: 暮光の裁きを融合する

displayName.schinese: 你的是我的，我的还是我的
displayName.tchinese: 你的是我的，我的還是我的
displayName.japanese: お前のものは俺のもの

description.english: Synthesize Blasphemous Cross
description.japanese: 冒涜のクロスを融合する

description.english: Synthesize Frigid Core
description.japanese: 氷結コアを融合する

description.english: Synthesize Sacred Feather Emblem
description.japanese: 聖羽紋章を融合する

description.english: Synthesize Cloud-Splitter Needle
description.japanese: 雲裂きの針を融合する

description.english: Purchase every item on the shop's shelf at once
description.japanese: 棚の商品をすべて購入する

description.english: There's something off about it
description.japanese: 何かがおかしい

description.english: The lord strikes with technique, not brute force
description.schinese: 领主觉得拳头太过顽固便换成了手掌
description.tchinese: 領主覺得拳頭太過固執便換成了手掌
description.japanese: 領主は拳を捨て、掌を選んだ

description.english: Helm! Of! Malice!
description.japanese: 悪！意！

description.english: Win 10 matches in the Zenith Arena
description.schinese: 在巅峰演武场中获胜 10 次
description.tchinese: 在巔峰演武場中獲勝 10 次
description.japanese: 頂点演武場で10勝する

description.english: Win 70 matches in the Zenith Arena
description.schinese: 在巅峰演武场中获胜 70 次
description.tchinese: 在巔峰演武場中獲勝 70 次
description.japanese: 頂点演武場で70勝する

description.english: Win 350 matches in the Zenith Arena
description.schinese: 在巅峰演武场中获胜 350 次
description.tchinese: 在巔峰演武場中獲勝 350 次
description.japanese: 頂点演武場で350勝する

description.english: Complete 50 bouts in the Zenith Arena
description.schinese: 在巅峰演武场中进行 50 次对局
description.tchinese: 在巔峰演武場中進行 50 次對局
description.japanese: 頂点演武場で50回対戦する

description.english: Complete 100 bouts in the Zenith Arena
description.schinese: 在巅峰演武场中进行 100 次对局
description.tchinese: 在巔峰演武場中進行 100 次對局
description.japanese: 頂点演武場で100回対戦する

description.english: Complete 200 bouts in the Zenith Arena
description.schinese: 在巅峰演武场中进行 200 次对局
description.tchinese: 在巔峰演武場中進行 200 次對局
description.japanese: 頂点演武場で200回対戦する

description.english: Reach 15 wins without losing your Soulfire
description.schinese: 不失去魂火的情况下达到 15 胜
description.tchinese: 不失去魂火的情況下達到 15 勝
description.japanese: 火種を失わずに15勝に到達する

description.english: Win a battle without taking any damage
description.japanese: ノーダメージで1勝する

description.english: Win 15 battles without taking any damage
description.japanese: ノーダメージで15勝する

description.english: Win 50 battles without taking any damage
description.japanese: ノーダメージで50勝する

description.english: Reach the summit without equipping any Armor
description.schinese: 不装备任何防具的情况下登顶
description.tchinese: 不裝備任何防具的情況下登頂
description.japanese: 防具を一切装備せずに登頂する

description.english: Reach the summit without any Mythic or Legendary items
description.schinese: 不装备任何神话和传说品质登顶
description.tchinese: 不裝備任何神話和傳說品質登頂
description.japanese: 神話、レジェンダリー品質を一切装備せずに登頂する

description.english: Defeat an enemy without equipping any Skills
description.schinese: 不装备任何招式，击败一个敌人
description.tchinese: 不裝備任何招式，擊敗一個敵人
description.japanese: 技を一切装備せずに敵を1体撃破する

description.english: Land a 15-hit Combo on an enemy
description.japanese: 敵に15連撃を与える

description.english: Defeat an enemy while at 1 HP
description.schinese: 自身血量为 1 时，击杀敌方
description.tchinese: 自身血量為 1 時，擊殺敵方
description.japanese: 己HPが1の状態で敵を撃破する

description.english: Be defeated by an enemy at 1 HP
description.schinese: 敌方血量为 1 时，击杀我方
description.tchinese: 敵方血量為 1 時，擊殺我方
description.japanese: 敵HPが1の状態で己が撃破される

description.english: An Eye for an Eye
description.japanese: 向こうから来なければ、そっとしておく

description.english: Defeat an enemy within 3 seconds
description.japanese: 3秒以内に敵を撃破する

description.english: Reach the summit without using any Potions
description.japanese: 薬水を一切使わずに登頂する

description.english: Answer every move with the perfect counter
description.japanese: 相手の手に応じて戦う

description.english: Perform 50 Blocks in a single battle
description.japanese: 1戦闘中に50回ガードする

description.english: Win 150 matches in Ranked Mode
description.schinese: 积分模式下获胜 150 场
description.tchinese: 積分模式下獲勝 150 場
description.japanese: ランクマッチで150勝する

description.english: Surpasses the divine
description.japanese: 神すら凌ぐ存在

displayName.japanese: リンゴ！スイカ！レモン！ドラゴンフルーツ！

description.english: Reach the summit with the Knight, Ronin, Plague Doctor, and WuJiang
description.schinese: 使用骑士、浪人、瘟疫医生、武将及海盗登顶
description.tchinese: 使用騎士、浪人、瘟疫醫生、武將及海盗登頂
description.japanese: 騎士?浪人?疫病医師?武将?海賊で登頂する

description.english: Save 10 characters to the Hall of Honor
description.schinese: 荣誉大厅存在 10 位角色
description.tchinese: 榮譽大廳存在 10 位角色
description.japanese: 栄誉殿堂に10人のキャラクターが存在する

description.english: Perform 50 Skill Fusions
description.japanese: 技を50回融合する

description.english: Perform 100 Skill Fusions. You should publish a guidebook
description.schinese: 合成 100 次招式！你就该写本书
description.tchinese: 合成 100 次招式！你就該寫本書
description.japanese: 技を100回融合する。もう本が書けるレベルだ

description.english: Perform 20 Item Fusions
description.japanese: アイテムを20回融合する

description.english: Perform 70 Item Fusions
description.japanese: アイテムを70回融合する

description.english: Perform 150 Item Fusions. You hammer even in your dreams
description.schinese: 合成 150 次道具！连梦里都在敲敲和打打
description.tchinese: 合成 150 次道具！連夢裡都在敲敲和打打
description.japanese: アイテムを150回融合する。夢の中でも融合をしている

description.english: Complete 33 runs with the Knight
description.schinese: 使用骑士完成 33 次游戏
description.tchinese: 觸發過所有騎士相關語音
description.japanese: 騎士として33回ゲームを完了する

description.english: Complete 33 runs with the Ronin
description.schinese: 使用浪人完成 33 次游戏
description.tchinese: 觸發過所有浪人相關語音
description.japanese: 浪人として33回ゲームを完了する

description.english: Complete 33 runs with the Plague Doctor
description.schinese: 使用瘟疫医生完成 33 次游戏
description.tchinese: 觸發過所有瘟疫醫生相關語音
description.japanese: 医師として33回ゲームを完了する

description.english: Complete 33 runs with the WuJiang
description.schinese: 使用武将完成 33 次游戏
description.tchinese: 觸發過所有武將相關語音
description.japanese: 武将として33回ゲームを完了する

description.english: Complete 33 runs with the Pirate
description.schinese: 使用海盗完成 33 次游戏
description.tchinese: 觸發過所有海盗相關語音
description.japanese: 海賊として33回ゲームを完了する

description.english: That's a lot of armor to carry
description.japanese: そんなに着込んで、大変そうだ

description.english: The greatest wanderer under heaven
description.japanese: 天下一の無一物

description.english: Reach the summit with the Plague Doctor
description.japanese: 疫病医師で登頂する

description.english: Fighting on instinct alone
description.japanese: すべては勘頼り

displayName.japanese: ちっちゃくてかわいい海賊

description.english: Reach the summit with the Pirate
description.japanese: 海賊で登頂する

description.english: Refresh the Shop 18 times in a single run
description.schinese: 旅途中刷新商店达到 18 次
description.tchinese: 旅途當中刷新商店達到 18 次
description.japanese: 1回の旅でショップを18回更新する

description.english: Refresh the Shop 200 times in total
description.schinese: 总计刷新商店达到 200 次
description.tchinese: 總計刷新商店達到 200 次
description.japanese: ショップを累計200回更新する

description.english: Sell items or skills a total of 50 times
description.japanese: 中古品販売中

description.english: You've perished 50 times!
description.japanese: もう50回も「進」んでいる！

description.english: Can't win them all, but you can quit them all
description.japanese: 勝てないが、逃げられる

displayName.japanese: マスターオブマスター

description.english: Obtain all mastery achievements
description.japanese: すべてのマスター級実績を獲得する

description.english: Heard all Knight voice lines
description.schinese: 触发过所有骑士相关语音
description.tchinese: 使用騎士完成 33 次遊戲
description.japanese: 騎士に関するすべてのボイスを再生した

description.english: Heard all Ronin voice lines
description.schinese: 触发过所有浪人相关语音
description.tchinese: 使用浪人完成 33 次遊戲
description.japanese: 浪人に関するすべてのボイスを再生した

description.english: Heard all Plague Doctor voice lines
description.schinese: 触发过所有瘟疫医生相关语音
description.tchinese: 使用瘟疫醫生完成 33 次遊戲
description.japanese: 医師に関するすべてのボイスを再生した

description.english: Heard all WuJiang voice lines
description.schinese: 触发过所有武将相关语音
description.tchinese: 使用武將完成 33 次遊戲
description.japanese: 武将に関するすべてのボイスを再生した

description.english: Heard all Pirate voice lines
description.schinese: 触发过所有海盗相关语音
description.tchinese: 使用海盗完成 33 次遊戲
description.japanese: 海賊に関するすべてのボイスを再生した

description.english: As the Knight, purchase the Helm of Arrogance
description.schinese: 使用骑士购买自大头盔
description.tchinese: 使用騎士購買自大頭盔
description.japanese: 騎士で「自惚れ兜」を購入した

description.english: As the Ronin, purchase the Armor Case
description.schinese: 使用浪人购买护具收纳
description.tchinese: 使用浪人購買護具收納
description.japanese: 浪人で「防具収納」を購入した

description.english: As the Plague Doctor, purchase the Anatomical Manuscript
description.schinese: 使用瘟疫医生购买解剖手稿
description.tchinese: 使用瘟疫醫生購買解剖手稿
description.japanese: 疫病医師で「解剖手帳」を購入した

description.english: As the WuJiang, purchase the Defiled Armor
description.schinese: 使用武将购买污浊装甲
description.tchinese: 使用武將購買污濁裝甲
description.japanese: 武将で「汚れた装甲」を購入した

description.english: As the Pirate, purchase any Potion
description.schinese: 使用海盗购买任意药水
description.tchinese: 使用海盗購買任意藥水
description.japanese: 海賊で任意のポーションを購入した

description.english: Returned to its rightful owner
description.japanese: 元の持ち主のもとへ

description.english: One chick slays another(40/40)
description.japanese: ヒヨコが……ヒヨコを倒した（40/40）

description.english: Who needs so many clothes?!
description.japanese: こんなに服はいらない！

description.english: Never stop moving! Never let the barrel cool!
description.japanese: 止まらず、撃ち尽くせ！

description.english: Bring a few more. It won't matter
description.japanese: まだ来い、いくらでも構わない

description.english: Embark again after 50 failed attempts at the summit
description.schinese: 摘星失败 50 次后再次踏上旅途
description.tchinese: 摘星失敗 50 次後再次踏上旅途
description.japanese: 進階モードで50回未登頂後、再び旅を開始する
